MODAL.LOGIN_SIGNUP_TITLE: To get your promo code, please log in or create a MoneyOwl account.
MODAL.PROMO_CODE_SUCCESS: Hurray! Your promo code is sent to your email

FINANCES_MODAL.TITLE: Step 2
FINANCES_MODAL.CONTENT_DESC: This is the amount you can set aside for protection needs and investing towards education and retirement goals.
FINANCES_MODAL.HOW_DO_WE_CALCULATE_DESC1: We take the Cash you own minus an Emergency Cash pool of 6 months’ of expenses and loan payments. Emergency Cash is important in case you lose your job or incur unexpected expenses.
FINANCES_MODAL.HOW_DO_WE_CALCULATE_DESC2: Monthly Spare Cash is your take home income minus your expenses and loan repayments minus your bad mood fund allocation.
FINANCES_MODAL.EMERGENCY_BELOW_DESC: Oh no, your liquid cash is less than 6 months' of expenses. Save before you invest.
FINANCES_MODAL.EMERGENCY_BELOW_NOTE_DESC: We will analyse your financial health more fully, assess your insurance needs and recommend how you can use your CPF for retirement.

NO_DEPENDANTS.TITLE: Step 3
NO_DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_DESC: This is the estimated cost of
NO_DEPENDANTS.SUB_TITLE_DESC: Each dollar whole life policy premium goes to:
NO_DEPENDANTS.SUB_TITLE_NOTE: Not drawn to scale. For illustration purposes only.
NO_DEPENDANTS.SUB_CONTENT_DESC1: When you buy a whole life plan, the bulk of your premiums goes to paying for a low-return investment. With this allocation, you will never fully cover yourself with expensive whole life policies.
NO_DEPENDANTS.SUB_CONTENT_DESC2: Term insurance is fit-for-purpose for most of us. We only need coverage when we still have dependants or when our earned income is needed.

DEPENDANTS.TITLE: Step 3
DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_DESC: Some types of medical insurance are needed for limited years and some are needed for life, for example:
DEPENDANTS.SUB_CONTENT_TITLE_DESC_1: Until retirement age or when we have no more dependants

RETIREMENT_MODAL.TITLE: Step 4
RETIREMENT_MODAL.SUB_CONTENT_DESC_21: 1. Safe retirement income floor to meet basic expenses & care expenses in event of disability
RETIREMENT_MODAL.SUB_CONTENT_DESC_21_NOTE: (e.g. CPF LIFE, ElderShield, CareShield, other annuities)
RETIREMENT_MODAL.SUB_CONTENT_TITLE_3: Medical insurance to cover large hospital bills
RETIREMENT_MODAL.SUB_CONTENT_TITLE_3_DESC: (e.g. MediShield Life, Private Integrated Shield Plans)

NO_DEPENDANTS.TITLE: Step 1
NO_DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_DESC: This is how much things may cost in 10 years’ time.
NO_DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_NOTE: That’s why you must save and grow your assets and get proper insurance coverage. It’s great that you are planning now!

DEPENDANTS.TITLE: Step 1
DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_DESC: This is how much university may cost you in future:
DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_BODY_DESC: This amount is calculated based on 6% p.a. inflation on tuition fees and 3% p.a. inflation on general living expenses.
DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_NOTE: It’s great that you are planning now!

COMPREHENSIVE.SUB_HEADER_3: A financial plan integrated with national schemes
COMPREHENSIVE.DESC1: As Singapore’s first Bionic Financial Adviser, MoneyOwl will journey with you using both technology and personalised advice.
COMPREHENSIVE.DESC2: In comprehensive planning, we will focus on your financial health, achieving your core financial goals of retirement and children’s education, and risk-proofing your plan.
COMPREHENSIVE.DESC3: We integrate national schemes like CPF with commercial solutions in our advice. Beyond traditional methods of pointing out gaps, we will tell you what you can already achieve with what you have.
COMPREHENSIVE.DESC4: This tool is currently available only for those aged 18 to 54 years old.
COMPREHENSIVE.DESC_SUB_TITLE_3: Face-to-Face: Client Adviser Time (2 hrs) and Implementation Plan
COMPREHENSIVE.DESC_SUB_ABOUT_1: To get the most out of your comprehensive financial planning journey and receive a suitable action plan, please fill in as many of the applicable fields as possible to the best of your ability. Every piece of information matters as the quality of the evaluation is very much dependent on the information you provide us.
COMPREHENSIVE.DESC_SUB_ABOUT_2: You can access your 3-in-1 analysis report on your MoneyOwl Account Dashboard within 1-2 working days. The report will comprise:
COMPREHENSIVE.DESC_SUB_ABOUT_2_SUB_POINT_3: Your Retirement and Children’s Education Plan
COMPREHENSIVE.DESC_SUB_ABOUT_3: When you are ready, our Client Adviser will meet you for a fuller consultation of up to two hours, where we can discuss your Financial Health report, refine your analysis and goals and customise your plan further. We will also help you to implement the plan through specific product recommendations, if you choose to do so.
COMPREHENSIVE.DESC_SUB_ABOUT_4: Financial planning is an ongoing process. We will prompt you to review your plan once a year. For a limited period, our clients will not be charged for the first-year review.

COMPREHENSIVE_STEPS.STEP_1_DESC: Your family commitments will impact your financial planning. Let's list it down now.
COMPREHENSIVE_STEPS.STEP_2_DESC: This information helps us to estimate what you can save and invest, your protection needs, and your financial health.
COMPREHENSIVE_STEPS.STEP_3_DESC: Let's find out how protected you are in face of unexpected events.
COMPREHENSIVE_STEPS.STEP_4_DESC: Tell us when you wish to retire and we will examine how you could reach this goal during your advisory session

MY_PROFILE.NATIONALITY_ALERT: Seems like you have changed your input for “Nationality”. Changes will be applied to all platforms upon saving.
MY_PROFILE.DOB_ALERT: Sorry, this tool is currently only available to those aged 18 to 54 years old. For other enquiries, you may wish to contact us at enquiries@moneyowl.com.sg.

DEPENDANT_SELECTION.TITLE: What's On Your Shoulders
DEPENDANT_SELECTION.DEPENDANTS_DESC: A dependant is a child, spouse, parent, sibling and/or relative you need to provide for.
DEPENDANT_SELECTION.HOUSEHOLD_TITLE: How many total number of people are there in your household?
DEPENDANT_SELECTION.HOUSEHOLD_DESC: Number of people includes your spouse, children, parents, grandparents, siblings and/or other relatives.

DEPENDANT_DETAILS.DESC: Tell us more about those you need to take care of and we will include their needs in your financial plan.

DEPENDANT_EDUCATION.ABOUT: Do you want to save up for your child's university education?
OPTIONS: No, but I need an insurance payout to cover education expenses in case I pass away

ENDOWMENT_PLAN.ABOUT: Select which child has education endowment plan
ENDOWMENT_PLAN.DESCRIPTION: Do have any existing education endowment plan?
ENDOWMENT_PLAN.SKIP_ENDOWMENT_PLAN: Skip, I do not have any
ENDOWMENT_PLAN.TOOLTIP_MESSAGE:
An education endowment plan is typically an insurance policy that matures and pays out around the time of the child’s entry into university.

If you bought a plan to fund more than one child’s education expenses, please allocate the maturity value for a more accurate analysis.

EDUCATION_PREFERENCE.HEADER: Tell us your preferences for their education.

MY_EARNINGS.ABOUT: Every month, you fill your bucket as you bring home an income!
MY_EARNINGS.ANNUAL_BONUS_DESC: Bonuses, dividends and other income you earn each year also fill up your bucket!
MY_EARNINGS.ADD_MONTHLY_INCOME_NOTE: You have added all types of income
MY_EARNINGS.ADD_DIVIDENDS_NOTE: You have added all types of annual income

TOOLTIP.MONTHLY_SALARY_MESSAGE: Your total monthly gross salary, including the portion that goes into your CPF.
TOOLTIP.ANNUAL_BONUS_MESSAGE: Annual bonus include 13th month payments, performance bonuses and other additional payments you expect to receive from work outside of the regular monthly paycheck.
TOOLTIP.ADD_MONTHLY_INCOME_MESSAGE: Additional work that pays you a monthly income with CPF should be in Other Work Income.
TOOLTIP.ADD_DIVIDENDS_MESSAGE: This is the total dividends or interest you expect to receive on a regular basis from your investments.

MY_SPENDINGS.ABOUT: When you spend, you draw from your income bucket.

TOOLTIP.OTHER_LOAN_MESSAGE: These are non-mortgage related loan repayments, such as renovation loans, car loans, credit lines, credit cards
TOOLTIP.LIVING_EXPENSES_MESSAGE: These are monthly personal expenses plus your share of household expenses, excluding mortgage and loan repayments.
TOOLTIP.MORTAGE_PAYMENT_MESSAGE: This is your share of the monthly mortgage payment for investment/ other properties.
TOOLTIP.HOME_LOAN_MESSAGE: This is your share of the monthly mortgage payment for the home you stay in.

GETTING_STARTED.TITLE: Get Started
GETTING_STARTED.HEADER: Thank you for using MoneyOwl’s Comprehensive Financial Planning service!
GETTING_STARTED.DESC: Let’s kickstart your financial plan by helping us to get to know you better.

DEPENDANT_EDUCATION_SELECTION.TITLE: Do you need to save up for any of your children's education?
DEPENDANT_EDUCATION_SELECTION.YES_DESC: Whose education would you like to fund?
DEPENDANT_EDUCATION_SELECTION.NO_LABEL: No, but I need an insurance payout to cover education expenses in case I pass away
DEPENDANT_EDUCATION_SELECTION.NO_DESC: Select which child you will like to cover for.
DEPENDANT_EDUCATION_SELECTION.ALERT: Please select at least one child.

RSP.TITLE: Do you have any Regular Unit Trust Saving Plans (RSP)?

TOOLTIP.RSP_MESSAGE: This refers to any fixed amount that you have committed regularly into buying an investment such as shares, bonds, unit trusts, etc.
TOOLTIP.OTHER_RSP_MESSAGE: This refers to any fixed amount that you have committed regularly into buying an investment such as shares, bonds, unit trusts, etc.

MY_ASSETS.TITLE: What You Own
MY_ASSETS.HEADER: You may have already stored up some buckets over time. Some of these assets can grow and help fund your future goals.

TOOLTIP.CASH_MESSAGE: This is cash that you can spend, save or invest. By the way, we do not recommend keeping it under the mattress! Consider bank deposits or Singapore Savings Bonds for your cash.
TOOLTIP.YOUR_HOME_MESSAGE: This is the current market value of your home. Do not deduct any mortgage outstanding on it.
TOOLTIP.INVESTMENT_PROPERTIES_MESSAGE: Property that you purchased with the purpose expectation of earning a return, either through the future resale of the property, rental income or both.
TOOLTIP.OTHER_PROPERTIES_MESSAGE: Other forms of committing money with the expectation of obtaining an profit or additional income or profit other than putting money into stocks, bonds, mutual funds, ETFs, real estate.
TOOLTIP.INVESTMENT_MESSAGE: Financial instruments you purchased with the expectation of obtaining an income or profit. Capital and returns are not guaranteed. Generally, the higher the expected return, the higher the level of risk.

MY_LIABILITIES.TITLE: What You Owe
MY_LIABILITIES.HEADER: Sometimes, we borrow to fund our assets or spending. These liabilities have to be repaid over time.

TOOLTIP.HOME_LOAN_OUTSTANDING_MESSAGE: This is the total outstanding loan for the home you live in that has yet to be paid off, not the monthly instalment.
TOOLTIP.OTHER_LOAN_MESSAGE: Add up your outstanding renovation loan, credit lines etc. This is the total loan amount that have yet to be paid off, not the monthly instalments.
TOOLTIP.OTHER_PROPERTY_LOAN_MESSAGE: Add up the outstanding loan amounts for all other properties. This is the total loan amount that have yet to be paid off, not the monthly instalments.
TOOLTIP.CAR_LOANS_MESSAGE: This is the total outstanding loan for any motor vehicle you own that has yet to be paid off, not the monthly instalment.

YOUR_FINANCES.HEADER: How You Spend When Down On Luck
YOUR_FINANCES.ABOUT: Sometimes life throws you a curveball.
YOUR_FINANCES.TITLE: Bad Mood Fund
YOUR_FINANCES.DESC: Why not put a little aside from your monthly surplus to pamper yourself on rough days without guilt or worry?
YOUR_FINANCES.LABEL_DESC: Your monthly allocation to your Bad Mood Fund.
YOUR_FINANCES.HOSPITAL_CHOICE_DESC: If you are ill or injured, which hospital ward will you choose?
YOUR_FINANCES.BAD_MOOD_FUND_ALERT: It appears that your spendings is currently more than your earnings. Review your expenses so that you have spare cash to set aside for bad mood days as well as save up for your financial goals.

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Bad Mood Fund
TOOLTIP.DESCRIPTION: Your Bad Mood Fund allocation should not exceed your monthly surplus. Your monthly surplus is your monthly take home salary minus your monthly cash expenses and loan repayments. It excludes all annual income and ad-hoc/yearly expenses.

RETIREMENT_PLAN.SUB_TITLE: We're almost done! Tell us when would you like to retire.
RETIREMENT_PLAN.ABOUT: I want to retire by age
RETIREMENT_PLAN.FORM_HEADER: Will you have any other sources of retirement income?

TOOLTIP.RENTAL_INCOME_MESSAGE: Any monthly payout you expect to receive during your retirement from any annuity, pension, investment scheme etc. It should exclude income from CPF LIFE, rental, dividends or interest which you have keyed in under Your Finances.
TOOLTIP.LUMP_SUMP_MESSAGE: A lump sum amount that you expect to receive to fund your retirement from any endowment policy, pension, deposits or bonds, investments etc.

RETIREMENT_PLAN.CONFIRM_DELETE: Your changes will not be saved. Do you wish to proceed?

INSURANCE_PLAN.SUB_TITLE: Your plans can be destroyed if your buckets of resources are depleted by large medical bills or if you lose your income. Here we ask you about your current risk-proofing.
INSURANCE_PLAN.HOSPITAL_PLAN_DESC: You want to stay in a
INSURANCE_PLAN.HOSPITAL_PLAN_LABEL_1: Do you have a hospitalisation plan that pays for this?
INSURANCE_PLAN.HOSPITAL_PLAN_LABEL_2: Does this Hospitalization plan include a rider?
INSURANCE_PLAN.LIFE_PROTECTION_LABEL_1: Do you have CPF Dependants’ Protection Scheme?
INSURANCE_PLAN.LIFE_PROTECTION_LABEL_2: Do you have HDB Home Protection Scheme (HPS) coverage?
INSURANCE_PLAN.HDB: Do you have HDB Home Protection Scheme (HPS) coverage?

TOOLTIP.CPF_MESSAGE: A basic term insurance that provides CPF members and their families a sum of money should the insured member pass away, suffer from Terminal Illness or Total Permanent Disability. It provides a maximum sum assured of $46,000 up to 60 years old. Premiums can be paid from the CPF Ordinary Account.
TOOLTIP.HOME_PROTECTION_SCHEME_MESSAGE: A mortgage reducing term insurance that protects CPF members and their families from losing their HDB flat should the insured member pass away, suffer from Terminal Illness or Total Permanent Disability. It pays off the member's share of the outstanding mortgage loan. Premiums can be paid from the CPF Ordinary Account.​
TOOLTIP.OTHER_LIFE_INSURANCE_MESSAGE: The total benefit payable to you or your loved ones from all your insurance policies in the event of death, Terminal Illness or Total Permanent Disability.
TOOLTIP.DISABILITY_INCOME_INSURANCE_MESSAGE: The monthly payout you can receive in the event you are not able to perform your current occupation due to a disability.
TOOLTIP.LONG_TERM_CARE_INSURANCE_MESSAGE: The monthly benefit you will receive in the event of a severe disability resulting in the inability to perform 3 out of 6 activities of daily living. ElderShield or CareShield Life is an example of such plans.
TOOLTIP.CRITICAL_INSURANCE_MESSAGE: The total benefit payable to you from all your insurance policies in the event you are diagnosed with a critical illness such as cancer, heart attack, etc.

RESULT.READY: Congratulations! Your report will be ready soon!
RESULT.DESC: We are analysing your needs using proprietary models now…
RESULT.ABOUT: Your report will be ready within the next 1-2 working day(s). Once it is ready, we will notify you via email at
RESULT.STEP_1: Keep a lookout for our notification mail!
RESULT.STEP_2: Set up an appointment with a MoneyOwl client adviser to go through your report.
RESULT.STEP_3: Customise and implement your financial plan with your adviser.
RESULT.TOOLTIP_TITLE: Sorry, you are unable to access the previous page.
RESULT.TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: As your information has been sent, you will not be able to return to your previous page. For any enquiries, you may reach us at enquiries@moneyowl.com.sg.

VALIDATE_RESULT.TITLE: Result
VALIDATE_RESULT.DESC: Uh-oh! It seems you have reached a roadblock.
VALIDATE_RESULT.ABOUT: As you have not filled in any fields under Your Finances, we are unable to generate your reports. Please review your inputs.

ENQUIRY.TITLE: Wait for our call!
ENQUIRY.DESC: We seek for your understanding and patience for our advisors will be contacting you within 2-3 working days.
ENQUIRY.SUB_DESC: For further enquries, feel free to contact us!

REVIEW.TITLE: Review
REVIEW.ABOUT: Please review your details carefully before clicking confirm. Do note that after you have confirmed, you will not be able to modify any of your inputs until your report is ready.
